#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Add multi-players support using GAE Channel API, and Google account login service.

= Details =

Multi-players support: [https://code.google.com/p/fainty-nmm/source/browse/src/com/google/gwt/faintynmm/server/GameServiceImpl.java GameServiceImpl.java].

Login with Google account: [https://code.google.com/p/fainty-nmm/source/browse/src/com/google/gwt/faintynmm/server/LoginServiceImpl.java LoginServiceImpl.java]

See also [https://code.google.com/p/fainty-nmm/source/browse/src/com/google/gwt/faintynmm/client/FaintyNMM.java FaintyNMM.java] which demonstrates how these two services are used.

Besides, the bulk of game logic part is modified.
